author: terence0083
content: ah yes, that's a subtle detail I completely missed and I dont think there's a way around it

author: tbenr
content:
Hey, is there any discussion around the opportunity to have BlobsSidecarsByRoot V1 in p2p? which I guess is BlobsSidecarsByBlockRoot V1.
How client are dealing with (or planning to deal with) missed `SignedBeaconBlockAndBlobsSidecar`  from `beacon_block_and_blobs_sidecar`  topic?

author: tbenr
content: I feel like we should have it

author: __flcl
content:
It's not planned to have block number based forks post-Shanghai, right?
Shall we use timestamps in genesis for sharding?

author: __flcl
content: ~~Another question: we do not verify Blobs to contain elements < BLS_MODULUS, should we do it in point evaluation precompile?~~

author: __flcl
content: ~~3. Looks like ECDSASignature's r and s in geth is four int64s with implications for encoding. For some reason I expected just plain 256 bits to be there, what do you guys think? Should it be like that or we can change it? It looks a bit weird because seems to revel details of internal implementation~~

author: terence0083
content: Hi <@504202741933932544> , indeed we should have it. I've opened an issue to track: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/issues/3088

author: terence0083
content: Question is `BlobsSidecarsByRoot` or `SignedBeaconBlockAndBlobsSidecarByRoot`, I'm leaning towards the later to avoid two calls

author: jessepollak
content:
**4844 Implementers' Call in ~1h (15:30 UTC)**

Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/655
Zoom: https://ethereumfoundation.zoom.us/j/88332629239?pwd=YmNpVVpaVy93RXhOTS9DYmNtWGtLdz09
Notes from prev calls: https://docs.google.com/document/d/15EatedrJanNxBZGPVASvwq9xgbTs5UxjsDfjpM6ppSY/edit#

Not livestreamed, but will be recorded and uploaded to YT later today.

author: tbenr
content: agreed, makes sense to mimic the coupled approach we have in gossip

author: realbigsean
content: I think the latter as well

author: jessepollak
content:
Thanks everyone for joining the call!

**Key takeaway: we're targeting launching devnet-3 by 11/30 with support from 6 clients**

Action  items:

- [@adietrichs] Add spec update 4844 for specifying that blobs must only be announced
- [@adietrichsr] Merge the modulus PR and the throughput reduction PR
- [<@862973562243252234> / <@427491045308235776>] Discuss whether c-kzg interface should be updated to better handle asserts
- [<@159152274659082240>] Merge the PR (#3052) rebasing EIP-4844 on Capella following merge of #3068
- [<@159152274659082240>] Open and merge PRs for including withdrawals field on engine-api spec and EIP-4844
- [<@363800010518822915>] Create and merge PR clarifying replacement of beacon_block topic with beacon_block_and_blobs_sidecar topic
- [<@363800010518822915>] Open PR and drive alignment on method for retrieving blobs by root
- [<@363800010518822915>] Continue driving alignment on the range PR (#3087)/

content:

content: Deprecation of `beacon_block` topic PR is here: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3090  (Thanks <@539495253418180618> )
